issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Noticed problems commenting out and reverting lines of text in the editor after the update that included highlighting of lines without semi-colons.
It seems to only affect some files but there are no warnings on the pages so I do not know what to look for, nor what I might include in this report to help you view the issue.

If there is a log that I can generate that will illustrate the action of this inaction I will be happy to attach. Please advise.
fields.summary: Commenting with Command+Fwd Slash not consistent
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201307242350
OS X 10.8.4, build 12E55, Macbook pro, 2.7 GHz intel core i7

comments.body:
Hi Keylo - Please can you describe the issue and its behavior in more detail (expected + actual)? So what actually happens, what does "highlighting of lines without semi-colons" mean? Would a screenshot help?

Thanks!
